Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Besaka darana vale, bagam ate casami'am vica honage
Vakhila ho javem inham vica surakhi'ata ate santi de nala
Ate asim unham de dilam vicom davaisa kadha devange. Sare asanam upara ahamane sahamane bharavam di taram rahinage
Ute unham nu ko'i dukha nahim pahucavega ate na hi uha kadhe janage
Mere badi'am nu khabara de devo ki maim mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata karana vala ha
Ate meri saza takalifa da'ika saza hai
Ate unham nu ibarahima de mahimanam de biratanta rahim savadhana karom
Jadom uha usa de kola a'e unham nu salama kita. Ibarahima ne akhi'a, ki sanu tuhade tom chara laga riha hai
Unham ne akhi'a ki daro nahim, asim tuhanu ika larake di khusakhabari dide ham. Jihara bara gi'ani hovega
Ibarahima ne akhi'a, ki tusim isa budhape vica mainu aulada di khusakhabari dide ho
Unham ne akhi'a ki asim tuhanu saca'i nala cagi khabara dide ham. Isa la'i tu nirasa hona vali'am vicom na bana
Ibarahima ne akhi'a, ki apane raba di kirapa tom bhatake ho'e lokam tom bina, hora kauna nirasa ho sakada hai
Kiha ki he bheje ho'e farisati'o! Huna tuhadi majila ki hai
Unham ne akhi'a, ki asim ika aparadhi kauma de vala bheje ga'e ham
Para luta de ghara vale, asim inham nu baca lavange
Bina usa di patani de jisa bare asim janade ham ki uha zarura papi lokam nala rahi javegi
